mainPackage

Class VoxelizedObject

  • java.lang.Object
    • mainPackage.VoxelizedObject
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    ExternalVoxelizedWorld, InternalVoxelizedWorld

    public abstract class VoxelizedObject
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Abstract class supporting a skeleton of a voxelized object. It provides method to support matrices, basic field as the number of voxel and some method to handle vertices if needed of 3D visualisation. This class has to be extended.
    Author:
    Guitard Alan
    See Also:
    Serializable, ExternalVoxelizedWorld, InternalVoxelizedWorld, Serialized Form

      • ScanToVoxel

        public void ScanToVoxel(Loader3DScan loader,
               javax.swing.JProgressBar bar)
                 throws java.lang.NumberFormatException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Constructor. Create the internal voxelized world loaded and associated by Loader3DScan and AssociationFrame reading the files a second times.
        Parameters:
        loader - the loader in the right state (so the file is read ad the associations are made)
        bar - the progress bar to update dynamically.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException
        java.io.IOException
        See Also:
        Loader3DScan, AssociationFrame

      • loadHashMap

        public void loadHashMap()
        Method call when the reader of the file is ready to read matrices, and fill the voxel with material and radiation values. Method call by loadFile in TopLevelInterface.
        Throws:
        java.lang.NumberFormatException - in case of bad matrix syntax (missing value, for instance)

      • checkAndFill

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> checkAndFill(double MouseX,
                                                  double MouseY,
                                                  Grid2D.Layer mode,
                                                  int activeLayer,
                                                  Material matToFillWith)
        Method set to be called by a 2D representation, to check if the MouseX and MouseY parameters is in the voxel.
        Parameters:
        MouseX - the X coordinate of the point to check.
        MouseY - the Y coordinate of the point to check.
        mode - the layer mode.
        activeLayer - the current layer in which seek the colision.
        matToFillWith - if the mouse is in a voxel, the voxel will be filled by this material.
        Returns:
        the list of voxel which has been changed

      • checkAndFill

        public java.util.ArrayList<java.lang.Integer> checkAndFill(java.awt.geom.Rectangle2D.Float selectRect,
                                                  Grid2D.Layer mode,
                                                  int activeLayer,
                                                  Material matToFillWith)
        Method set to be called by a 2D representation, to check if the rectangle parameters is in the voxel.
        Parameters:
        selectRect - the rect to check with.
        mode - the layer mode.
        activeLayer - the current layer in which seek the colision.
        matToFillWith - if the mouse is in a voxel, the voxel will be filled by this material.
        Returns:
        the list of voxel which has been changed
